DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize addition 6 minute exercise school day would increase physical fitness elementary school student demonstrate long distance run 2 minute decrease heart rate end exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Brief Physical Activity Program Increase Physical Fitness Elementary School Children
DOC.detailed_description: Intervention group play music 6 minute morning addition recess physical activity class . Baseline fitness data after-intervention data compare .
DOC.criteria: All student invite participate . Lack parental consent
